basic_information.scholarship_name: H.B. Mitchell Endowed Scholarship for Debate

description: This scholarship is named in honor of former debate coach Harland B. Mitchell and is awarded to the student who exemplifies the best qualities of Oklahoma high school debate. This scholarship is for Oklahoma residents only and is only available to students beginning their first semester at UCO. Eligibility Requirements Oklahoma resident committed to UCO Accepted into Debate program Documents to prove success (tournaments, awards, competitions) Minimum 3.0 GPA Letter of Recommendation from High School Debate coach

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
